result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody Ray Levake

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on December 12, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

1:02 PM Defendant Cody Ray Levake appeared by video.  Attorney Randall Walter Petrouske II in court for Cody Ray Levake.  Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at. Atty Petrouske indicates close to resolution, requests plea/sentencing date.  State has no objection. Bond remains in effect.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Status conference on October 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains in effect.

1:48 PM   Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Cody Ray Levake in court.  Attorney Randall Walter Petrouske II in court for Cody Ray Levake.   Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover.
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on July 28, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

1:43 PM  Defendant Cody Ray Levake in court.  Attorney Randall Walter Petrouske II in court for Cody Ray Levake.  Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for State of Wisconsin.  ADA Grodes indicates we can call case early as they are in compliance with victim rights.  Court reviews events in file.  Defense waives reading of the complaint, waives time limits for prelim.  Atty Petrouske requests a status be set. State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 20, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Order for Substitution of Attorneys
Motion for Discovery
Letter to Judge Ehlers re: Request to Reschedule June 6th hearing.      Pamela: Reschedule. DTE
Order for Substitution of Attorneys

from defendant requesting a continuance.      Pamela: Reschedule to 6/6/22. DTE
Adjourned initial appearance on April 18, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

10:05 AM Defendant Cody Ray Levake appeared in court, Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode appeared in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews events in file, questions defendant on where he's at regarding legal representation.  Defendant indicates he does qualify for SPD representation but would like time to get funds together to retain atty on his own.  State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on February 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Defendant was fingerprinted 2/15/22.
Subpoena Witness Data Sheet
No violent contact with J.M.H.

1:00 PM Defendant Cody Ray Levake appeared in court, Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode appeared in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel. Court questions defendant on how he wishes to proceed regarding legal representation.  Defendant would like to talk to SPD to see if he qualifies or possibly waive his right to an attorney and talk to the State to try and resolve matter.  Court encourages defendant to contact SPD to see if he qualifies.  If he doesn't qualify, Court sends waiver of right to attorney form for defendant to fill out and bring with him to next hearing, if that's the route he wishes to go. Court questions defendant on address/employment.  Bond set.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
by Tammy Enz
